name: Plants (itch)
description:
a tiny game about gardening

by @TheRealMolen

I made this in the summer of 2015, to try out some game feel ideas I had.

You need to catch falling plants, and put them safely in the earth. If you put a plant right next to one of the same colour, it'll grow bigger. If you miss a plant, the pot smashes, and does a small amount of damage to anything it lands on. You can't lose.
